short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install the Mamma Search Companion to sync your omnibar search settings with Mamma search bar. Free upgrade in the Chrome Store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you already enjoying the benefits of the Mamma Chrome Extension? Well, here's some excellent news for you! By installing the Mamma Search Companion Extension, you can enhance your browsing experience even further.

This extension offers seamless synchronization between your Mamma search field settings and Omnibox search settings, enabling you to customize your Mamma Extension even further.

Moreover, studies have shown that alternative search engines can lead to a more diverse and unbiased search experience than relying solely on Google Search. So, by using Mamma, you can broaden your knowledge and perspectives on various topics by quickly switching search engines to compare and find new information about your requested topics.

Don't miss the opportunity to maximize your browsing experience with Mamma Search! 

☆☆ Key Features ☆☆
✓ Seamless synchronization between your Mamma search field settings and Omnibox search settings
✓ Quickly choose alternative search engines to use in your Omnibox

IMPORTANT: After installing Mamma, click the ‘Keep it’ button on the ‘Change back to Google’ notification. This will show your chosen images on each new tab as desired.  

☆☆ Privacy and Security ☆☆
Mamma takes your security and privacy very seriously. We can ensure that:
- Your information will never be sold to a third party.
- Our collected URL data will never be associated with you or your account.
- You can review our complete terms of service at www.mamma.com/terms and our privacy policy at www.mamma.com/privacy
- You can read more about us at www.mamma.com/about

☆☆ Terms ☆☆
- By clicking “Add to Chrome,” you accept and agree to install the ‘Mamma Search’ Сhrome extension and set your default search to Mamma Search, provided by the service and the terms of use and privacy policy. The extension will allow Mamma to collect your URL data (which will never be shared or associated with your or your Mamma account).
- You can review our complete terms of use at https://www.mamma.com/terms
